author: Staff Reporter
text:
Woman sets

husband on fire

A 38-year-old woman allegedly set her husband afire following an argument at their house in Bharathidasan Colony near Maduravoyal. Police said Poongodi (38), who was arrested after the incident, told them that her husband Ramesh (42), a daily-wage worker, was an alcoholic who assaulted her frequently. The couple lived with their 13-year-old son until six months ago. On Saturday, Ramesh came to her house and fought with her, police said.

Poongodi poured petrol on him and set him afire. Neighbours rushed him to the Government Kilpauk Medical College & Hospital where he succumbed to his injuries.
title: Woman sets husband afire
